Experience

  • Web Developer/Database Designer Jun 2000 – Jul 2001
    Cybernet Systems, Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA
    • Responsible for design, development, testing and implementation of Cybernet Medical
      Database Application (Internet based patient data management system).
    • Software: Oracle, Cold Fusion, Dreamweaver, Database Design Studio, Java Script, HTML

  • Consultant/Developer Jul 1998 – Jul 1999
    Dataspace Incorporated , Ann Arbor, Michigan, USA
    • Designed and developed an enterprise-wide data warehouse for vehicle claims
      from dealers at Volkswagen of America. The system was used to report and analyze data
      from vehicle claims.
    • Designed and developed a data warehouse to support new types of cross-functional reporting
      by creating a corporate data warehouse for Detroit Medical Center that integrates data from a
      variety of sources.
    • Software: Oracle, Data Stage, Discoverer, Business Objects, Oracle Developer 2000

  • Software Engineer Mar 1996 – Dec 1997
    • Ontario Legal Aid Plan, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
    • Designed and developed the interface for the Service Encounter System (SES). SES is a client/server
      application for employees of the Ontario Legal Aid Plan. SES helps automate most functions or procedures
      previously performed manually at the 50 area offices.
    • Software: Oracle, InConcert, FormFlow, Crystal Reports, MS Query

  • Web Developer/Alumni Project Assistant Sep 1994 – May 1995
    • York University, Toronto, Ontario, Canada
    • Created web pages for Department of Mathematics and Statistics to inform staff and students about courses, degrees and events.
